description: Open the M-Pesa menu in the SIM toolkit of your mobile device.
Under Business No. enter our paybill number: 728655.
Under Account No. enter your Parternâ€™s Number or you full name, along with your reason for giving. (e.g. John Doe - tithe)
Enter the amount you want to give.
You should receive a confirmation popup message. The name included in the message should be FEM FAMILY CHURCH MSA. Cancel the transaction if it does not.
Once the transaction is confirmed, you should received a confirmation SMS from MPESA. Thank you for your giving!
